snippet.title: The Children of Clay - Study an ancient artefact and discover its dark secret!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://ronyaib.itch.io/the-children-of-clay?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt The Children of Clay is a short stop motion archeology horror game, where you have to study an ancient artefact and discover its dark secret.

➡️ More from Balázs Rónyai https://ronyaib.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
